name: Cyberfunk Pizzaboy
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look/Aim

Shift - Hold to sprint

Left Click - Pick up pizza from shop/ give pizza to customer

Right Click - Throw pizza

Cyberfunk Pizzaboy is a project I've been playing with on and off for a few months. The idea spawned from wanting to make a Crazy Taxi-like game but a little more my style with a little more story behind the character and the world.

This is just a prototype. There's plenty of work to be done if I keep moving forward, but I wanted to show off what I've been working on and see if anybody else likes the idea and direction.

This game was created and developed by myself, using assets from Synty Studios and music from bensound.com.
